heading: Fetid Mausoleum Dungeon Guide
content: Fetid Mausoleum does not host any dangerous monster types, and has a compact layout that requires a great deal of backtracking. It is decent for farming, but is not currently a possible . The Blood Bishop boss is easy to defeat, with only one annoying attack where it tries to capture and stun you. This attack can be avoided by a well-timed Evade or mobility skill just before it happens. This dungeon unlocks the , a decent defensive aspect for the Sorcerer. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
